Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleAdvertisingSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleAdvertisingSettings
  • public class BleAdvertisingSettings
extends Object
    Class used specify Ble Advertising settings.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode
      Type-safe parallel of static final int members of AdvertiseSettings.
      static class  BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower
      Type-safe parallel of static final int members of AdvertiseSettings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BleAdvertisingSettings()
      Overload of BleAdvertisingSettings(BleAdvertisingMode, BleTransmissionPower, Interval), which sets the BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode.AUTO, BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower.MEDIUM, and the timeout to Interval.ZERO (no timeout).
      BleAdvertisingSettings​(BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode mode, BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower power, Interval timeout)
      Base constructor which sets all relevant Ble advertising settings
      BleAdvertisingSettings​(BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower power)
      Overload of BleAdvertisingSettings(BleAdvertisingMode, BleTransmissionPower, Interval), which sets the BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode.AUTO, and the timeout to Interval.ZERO (no timeout).
      BleAdvertisingSettings​(BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower power, Interval timeout)
      Overload of BleAdvertisingSettings(BleAdvertisingMode, BleTransmissionPower, Interval), which sets the BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode.AUTO.
      BleAdvertisingSettings​(Interval timeout)
      Overload of BleAdvertisingSettings(BleAdvertisingMode, BleTransmissionPower, Interval), which sets the BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleAdvertisingMode.AUTO, and BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower to BleAdvertisingSettings.BleTransmissionPower.MEDIUM.

        public BleAdvertisingSettings()
